attributes.action: Change the law so that life in prison means life in prison,in cases where the evidence is overwhelming especially in cases of murder and child molestation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:


http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Harderprisons/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
